</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return all [[Eden Editor: Connecting|connections]] currently present on an entity. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''get3DENConnections''' entity </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entity: [[Eden Entity]] or [[Eden ID]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format:
<code>[[type1,to1], [type2, to2], ..., [typeN, toN]]</code>

* to: [[Eden Entity]] to which the connection leads to
 </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
